entries.title: Combat & ESP upgrade
highlights: Improved aimbot smoothing and weighted hitpart logic.
Added ESP distance fade and ESP FOV limiter.
Added free-key (no HWID) support in Key UI.

added: Support for free keys (bind_hwid = false) without HWID check.
ESP FOV circle limiter for performance.
changed: ESP box scaling now adapts to distance for better readability.
Aimbot smoothness range changed to 0.05â€“1.00 for better control.
fixed: Fixed groupbox layout not updating when resizing window.
Fixed MainHub crash when Drawing API is not available.

entries.title: Key UI & MainHub integration
highlights: Added second layer keycheck for MainHub.
Integrated Key UI with MainHub loader.

added: Key UI window with Info/Status/Script Info/Changelog tabs.
MainHub loader that accepts (Exec, keydata, keycheck) parameters.
Key auto-load from local file for valid keys.
changed: Refactored Exec abstraction for multi-executor support.
fixed: Fixed issue where status text overlapped in Status groupbox.

entries.title: Early ESP & Player build
highlights: Basic Player tab (WalkSpeed, JumpPower, Fly, NoClip).

added: ESP box + tracers with simple settings.
